About

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur.

  • 2005

    Our Company Beginnings

    Shenzhen Falcon Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005. We are a hi-tech company engaged in the R&D, production and distribution of proprietary intellectual property products, such as digital products, entertainment products and consumer electronic products.

  • March 2011

    Become a reliable OEM/ODM partner

    With a focus on innovation, quality, one-stop services and social responsibility, we have become a reliable OEM/ODM partner.

  • December 2015

    Our goods bear CE, FCC and RoHS marks

    Innovation is one of the reasons why we stand out in the competition. Thanks to our talented engineers and continual investment in R&D, we manage all processes in our 5,000-square-meter facilities according to ISO9001:2008 and IS14001:2009 certificates. Our goods bear CE, FCC and RoHS marks.

  • July 2018

    Develop cutting-edge technologies

    We carry out all of our process in-house for quality consistency and low costs. Furthermore, utilizing our own R&D center, our engineers develop cutting-edge technologies to keep clients abreast of the latest trends.

  • Be Part
    Of Our
    Story!

Pet Tracker

Details

  • Battery: 300mah
  • Size:43mm x 37mm x 15mm
  • ◇ Real-time tracking via GPS/WIFI/LBS
  • ◇ Geo-fence alarm
  • ◇ Real-time tracking by SMS/Platform
  • ◇ Low battery alarm
  • ◇ Flexible set time interval upload
  • ◇ Charging by docking station or USB

Includes

  • 1 x Device
  • 1 x USB cable
  • 1 x Two Type Pet Collars
  • 1 x Charging Dock
  • 1 x User manual
  • 1 x Color box

Manual Roof Mount Satellite TV Dish

Details

ADAS (LDWS & FCWS),WDR,Motion Detect, G-Sensor,Cycle Recording,Audio Record,Auto Power ON/OFF, Parking Monitor,Multi-language are available.

Includes

  • Chipset Mstar 8336 + SONY 307 Sensor
  • Screen 4.0" IPS Display (640*480) + optional Touch Panel
  • Camera 12.0MP 170° Wide-angle 6G lens
  • Video Resolution Front Real 1080P 1920x1080@30fps
  • + Rear AHD 720P 1080*720@25fps
  • Body Private Design METAL Material
  • File Format Video as H.264 MOV, Photo as JPG
  • Memory Capacity Support 4 ~ 128 GB TF card
  • Optional Function GPS logger, Rear Camera
  • Battery lithium polymer battery 300mAh
